alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 11:00PM CDT until July 05 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR EASTERN TEXAS...NORTHERN HANSFORD AND WESTERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 1100 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Optima to 6 miles southwest of Hardesty, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Spearman, Hooker, Tyrone, Optima, Hardesty, Baker, Adams, Farnsworth and Waka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
